resources.string:
Are you feeling brain washed from a long day? Or are you simply just not keen on taking on the front seat, because of the disputes that may arise if you happen to count the change incorrectly?

 Fear no more because this is just the application to assist you. Shot Left App is a designed to make the counting of change much easier, efficient and error free. It easily keeps track of the collections and you don't do any counting yourself - it automatically counts for you, tell you if the money is short and determines the change and the money you should give to the taxi driver.

 This application is most useful for the large number of taxi users across South Africa - and it has become a norm and tradition for any passenger occupying the front seat to assist with the collection of transport payment during the ride.

Thank you for trying out the app, if you need any application support, or have any queries or great suggestions on how this application can be improved, do not hesitate to email us. After all, this is a proudly South African app.
